name: Climbing Vine
description: The Climbing Vine is a medium-sized plant creature with flexible, vine-like appendages that it uses for grappling and inflicting damage.
memorable: It grapples foes and inflicts acid damage through its Digestive Dew ability.
goals: To entrap and damage creatures within its reach.
relations: Often found in overgrown areas alongside other plants and creatures of similar habitat.
environment: Typically found in jungles, forests, or overgrown ruins.
strengths: Can grapple multiple targets at once and deal acid damage.
weaknesses: Very low Dexterity making it easy to evade its attacks.
attacks: Uses Dewvine to grapple opponents with its vine-like appendages, delivering bludgeoning damage through Squeeze.
most_powerful_ability: Digestive Dew which inflicts acid damage to grappled creatures.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 20 feet, allowing it to sense nearby creatures without sight.
skills: Has a poor perception skill with a -2 modifier.
additional_information: Unaffected by being blinded, charmed, deafened, exhausted, frightened, or prone
Can move through spaces as narrow as 6 inches
Triggers a reaction when hit in melee
test_queries: vine that can fit through narrow spaces
